column1: The '''Chequers Clubbe''' was a dining society at [[University of Oxford#Exeter College|Exeter College]]
column2: founded in [[Wikipedia:Hilary term|Hilary Term]] [[1914]] by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] and Colin Cullis
column3: and given permission by the Sub-Rector on [[30 January]] 1914. Many of the members had likely previously been members of the [[Apolausticks]]
column4: another club founded by Tolkien.<ref>[[Wayne G. Hammond]] and [[Christina Scull]] (2006)
column5: ''[[The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide]]: Reader's Guide''

column1: Tolkien provided the menu artwork (see ''[[Ye Chequers Clubbe Binge]]'') for a club dinner
